qns.quantum.qubit package¶

Submodules¶

qns.quantum.qubit.basis module¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Variables

  • X -- X basis

  • Z -- Z basis

Z = 0¶

qns.quantum.qubit.polar module¶

class qns.quantum.qubit.polar.Polar(value)¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Polar is the quantum state of a single photon

Variables

  • H -- |1> state

  • V -- |0> state

  • P -- |+> state

  • Q -- |-> state

  • A -- Any state

  • N -- Not be measured

A = -2¶
H = 1¶
N = -1¶
P = 3¶
Q = 2¶
V = 0¶

qns.quantum.qubit.qubit module¶

class qns.quantum.qubit.qubit.Qubit(birth_time_slice: int, fidelity: float = 1, live_func=None, name: Optional[str] = None)¶

Bases: object

This is the qubit class in quantum model

Parameters

  • birth_time_slice -- its birth time slice

  • fidelity -- its fidelity

  • live_func -- inject a live_func to determine whether this qubit is decohered.

  • name -- its name

is_entangled() → bool¶

Returns whether it is entangled with other qubits. :returns: bool, true if it is entangled

is_live() → bool¶

Returns whether it is decohered. If live_func is injected, this self-defined function will be used. Or it will always return self.fidelity >= 0.5.

Returns

bool, true if it is still not decohered.

set_fidelity(fidelity: float)¶

Set its fidelity

exception qns.quantum.qubit.qubit.QubitFidelityInvaildError¶

Bases: Exception

Module contents¶

This package contains a basic model for qubit
